message:
The initial MVP is just keeping everything simple for now. In particular, I assume that site visitors will be using a modern browser with JS enabled. Or at the very least, know how to enable JS themselves. :)

Isomorphism is a possibility, but it would be some time before it would happen. There's a *lot* in the backlog! Iso is one of those "nice to haves" that - for this site - would mainly be about reducing the initial load time. And the initial load time isn't *too* bad at the moment, so iso is a pretty low priority.

I am using a .NET backend; iso is still possible by hosting Node. This kind of approach looks promising: [https://github.com/aspnet/NodeServices](https://github.com/aspnet/NodeServices) But I'd estimate it's over a year out from a stable v1 release.
